template.name: java_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the java module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for java plugins that are executed by a browser.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

desc.p: This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: java_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute the java program in the java domain.
